nodes.text: Saijo was an Outer Rim Territories fortress world near Cantros 7. It had green river valleys.

It was part of the Alliance of Free Planets until conquered by the Nagai during the Nagai–Tof War. It was later taken by the Tofs and eventually became the location of the last battle of the conflict.

By 130 ABY, the world was a colony and fortress world of the Nagai. When the galaxy was reclaimed by the Galactic Empire of Darth Krayt, Saijo was claimed as well, and the planet became one of the most heavily-defended worlds in the Outer Rim.
